review.comment: Been getting meals from Edibolic Kitchen for a couple of years now.  Food quality and taste is always exceptional.  And their customer service is outstanding.  It's a great way to have healthy meals ready after a very long day at work.

I am a current college student and an active athlete; Edibolic Kitchen has given me nothing but amazing overall service.  The food is healthy, fresh and tasty. The owner (Josh) has always been very helpful when it comes to my food orders, particularly  avoiding specific foods that I am allergic to as well.  I would recommend this place to everyone.. the food is amazing and their customer service is even better!
I've been using meal services for the past 8 years and Edibolic is my favorite this far.  Great variety, food is always fresh and deliveries are the most consistent.  Can't go wrong!

Ive been a customer for a year every single time something was wrong:
Turkey chilli not fully cooked
Lying about what gyms there delivering to while on their page the gyms are listed
Spending a hot day driving to 3 different locations then waiting an hour to recieve my meal
Hearing the owner tell a gym owner they dont deliver there anymore while the Crossfit gym is on their list
The final straw him telling me to drive around Hartford for my meals.
I have a hard time believing his reviews werent bought!!!..... no you told me to meet him in rocky hill also it wasnt the 1st time it happened. Remember when i went to multiple locations to get my meals then waited at Brandford for 2hours for you
review.review_reply:
Hi Fedeline,
I’m very sorry for your experience.
All items are temped before being taken of the stove or out of the oven. Our turkey chili is slow cooked on the stove top for a minimum of 2 hours and brought well above the 165 degree temperature threshold. As for the gym delivery situation, during the pandemic we have lost a number of partnered gyms from closures. The one in particular you are referring to actually switched owners at some point over the last couple months and we were never alerted. The gym owner told you, that we didn’t deliver there anymore but we had never been informed. When you called us looking for your order I immediately contacted our driver. I called back right away and mentioned that he was slightly behind and suggested as a courtesy to you that he could veer off his route and meet you on your way back home as to not make you wait. Your response was I don’t like to drive and asked to cancel your order. I happily did this right then and thought we had rectified the situation.

review.comment: Delicious food at a great price!

We love ordering meals from edibolic kitchen.  The food is always amazing.  It makes it easy to make healthy choices without all the prep work.
Thank you for helping our family led a healthy lifestyle.
Tasty way to eat clean and healthy 🙂

This is a GREAT service..If one doesn't like to cook for themselves. It's beyond Blue Apron, Plate It, etc. All food is prepared fresh, organic when available, customizable, and NOT frozen. No preparation required like the others. Just heat and serve. No defrosting. Combine with a salad and soup, and it's a super easy way to get low sodium, low/no sugar, complex carbs and lean high protein into one's diet. With nearly zero effort. For me, this business is a godsend. I eat super healthy with little effort. And my last blood chem report seems to support this. In the beginning, Josh actually sat down with me and discussed my specific nutritional needs. Super helpful. Give them a try. No meal plans where you must buy so many meals. Order a few meals, and if you're not happy, there's no further obligation! Now it's easy to take a small nutritious meal to the office, toss into the microwave and still eat very well.
Incredibly tasty food to the point where I can’t believe I’m actually eating healthy.   Great portions and variety and service is A++.
Delicious food!

Great tasting and healthy food prepared by chefs who are truly masters of their craft! Plenty of delicious variety’s to choose from or customize your own meals. The staff provides great service and personalization, taking the time to get to know the individual.
Not a good place to work but I will definitely vouch for their delicious recipes...
Food tastes great and it is made with exactly the right amount of carbs, protien, fat, etc that I specify.  Delivery is reliable.

I used Edibolic for 2 bodybuilding preps and 1 powerlifting meet prep. The customer service is easily the best I have EVER experienced from a meal prep company BY FAR. My orders were never messed up and god forbid they were Edibolic would replace anything free of charge and sometimes even give a little more for the mistake. Ordering could not be any easier, pick up is so simple. If you ever get a chance to try Edibolic you will NOT be disappointed. I was able to meet Josh personally and you can tell he truly cares about the business and the positive effect proper meal prep can have in someones life. I wish I still lived in CT because Edibolic would be taking all my money 😅
Delicious fresh food every time I place an order. You will not regret ordering from Edibolic Kitchen. The food is amazing!

Edibolic keeps my fitness and nutrition goals on track, while saving me time and money from when I used to order takeout at work. I order at least 3-4 meals per week and I have seen savings in my food budget and improved my overall health. The portions are perfect and they are always switching up the menu and allowing me to try new things, while leaving some of the classics consistently available. This is one of the best investments in yourself you can make!

The food is fresh and delicious, makes it easier to eat healthy. Josh is also very responsive and provides great customer service. He’s very understandable and accommodating if I miss the order deadline so I don't have to wait a whole week. You don’t get that at other meal prep services. Highly recommend Edibolic Kitchen.

Ive been a customer of Edibolic for a decent amount of time now, and i couldnt be happier.  awesome, fresh food with many options!  delivery is always prompt as well.  the owner, Josh, always answers any questions when needed too.  highly recommend!!!!

I am one of those people that if the food is in front of me I will eat it. Edibolic makes well portioned tasty meals that satisfy my hunger.  Between exercising and eating Edibolic's meals, I have gone from a high of 235 pounds to 200 pounds. I have about 15 more pounds to lose but their healthy gourmet food is making it easier for me to reach my goals.
not what i thought
review.review_reply: Hi Susan. I don’t see your name in our system. Did you recently receive an order?  Would love to get any feedback you have. Feel free to email us at orders@edibolic.com or call us at 203.907.6401.

review.comment: Interesting menus and good food supported by fantastic customer service.

The food is great, they work with my nutritionist to make and deliver my menu each week. I have had a few unusual requests and they have gone out of their way to be helpful and friendly. I highly recommend.
review.review_reply: We appreciate the positive comments! Thank you!

review.comment:
THE BEST OF THE BEST!!!! WILL ONLY USE THIS COMPANY HERE ON OUT FOR MY PREPARED FOOD.

Also had them cater a recent event... STILL receiving compliments. The owner is amazing and provided flawless service. Thanks Josh!
review.review_reply: Thank you Brittney! We appreciate the kind words! Happy to work with you!

review.comment: Edibolic Kitchen is not only delicious, but it is affordable feel-good food. I have been ordering from them for a little over a year and I have not had a single negative experience.  Every interaction I have had  with the team has always been very positive. Edibolic kitchen has been instrumental in helping me get my life and my health back on track. I suggest this service to anyone and everyone. If you're unsure, try it. You will not be disappointed. Thanks E.K!
review.review_reply: Thank you Chris! We appreciate your continued trust and patronage!

review.comment: Cannot say enough good things about this company!! Everything from my customer service experience to the high quality DELICIOUS meals, has been top notch. Total game changer, and I couldn't be more impressed. Other meal services should take note!!
review.review_reply: Thank you Danielle! Very kind of you!

review.comment: While competing in bodybuilding I’d stress the meal prep. The owner Josh took the time out of his day to help me plan out my routine with his meals. The passion behind his service is phenomenal. Highly recommend.
review.review_reply: Thank you George! We are excited to be part of your goals and fitness journey!

review.comment: Ordering from Ediblolic has made staying on track so much easier for my busy work life. The food here is great quality, always dependable, and very tasty! Would definitely recommend giving this place a try!
review.review_reply: Thank you Shana! Happy to hear you are enjoying the service!

review.comment: Edibolic Kitchen has been delivering my favorite lunches and dinners every week for over two years. Their meals are consistently fresh and high quality.  The delivery service and online ordering make it very convenient. Highly recommend!
review.review_reply: Thank you Aaron! We appreciate your continued trust and business!

review.comment: I love this meal service! The food is delicious and really takes the stress out of meal prepping for the week!
review.review_reply: Thank you Sabrina! We appreciate the trust and compliments!

review.comment: Such a great experience. Great food and service. So happy I found Edibolic Kitchen!
review.review_reply: Thank you Marissa! Happy to hear it!

review.comment:
Ordered last week after seeing them on channel 8.
I ordered online and they called and took order also on phone. They said something on their website wasn’t working.. They apologized and said I was all set. Expecting my food I did not grocery shop and it was never delivered. Called them and no return call.
They need to get their act together. Wasted my time.
review.review_reply: Hi Joan. Thank you for reaching out. We attempted to deliver to your home on Monday but the address we were given was only for the development so we were unable to find your home. Our driver called and left a message and we also called today to try to get your meals delivered. Unfortunately we hadn’t received a call or email back yet. We would love the opportunity to rectify the situation. Please email us at orders@edibolic.com so we can get this resolved.

review.comment: Wonderful experience every week with Edibolic Kitchen. The meals are delicious and I know I’m eating healthy. The home delivery service makes it simple with a busy schedule. Highly recommend!
Great experience ordering from Edibolic! I love their weekly specials and it’s a great way to grab easy lunches and dinners on busy days. Awesome and convenient delivery service as well!

What a great service.  I lead a very busy lifestyle chasing 3 kids and running a business.  Edibolic Kitchen has been a game changer.  I no longer have to worry about eating unhealthy,  preparing meals or spending time going out for lunch.  I get three healthy meals a day delivered to my office.  I gain about 2 hours a day in productivity and have lost over 24 pounds.  The best part is I really like the food.

I’ve tried other meal prep services and they pale in comparison to Edibolic!  The meals are delicious and the bulk ordering makes personal prepping easy. The delivery option is incredibly convenient for a busy schedule.

Thank you guys for always taking great care of us! The food is always delicious and the customer service really is phenomenal. You guys make our hectic lives easier and enable us to make healthy lifestyle choices that align with our fitness goals inspite of our busy schedules. We appreciate you!

This place is great....food is always fresh and tastes great ...also being one of the owners of universal fitness I could honestly say all our customers who use Edibolic Kitchen have nothing but great things to say....

For more than six months, Edibolic Kitchen has been delivering delicious and  affordable dinner meals to my home.   I no longer shop or cook dinner during the week.  I've lost 15 pounds by sticking with the lean portions and having a salad with my meal.   My daughter and I love that the food is cooked fresh, its convenient,  and inventive.  Every week there is a  new surprise menu item and an opportunity to try something a different.  Edibolic literally saved me from countless nights of self sabotage.  I know what I am eating at 730 pm and my daughter gets to eat when she gets home at 530 pm.   Food is not wasted.  There is no mess.   Its perfect!

AMAZING, healthy, quality meal delivery service.
Food is fresh, data is clear on all aspects of the food on the website. I have my food delivered bi-weekly and its always there and packaged cold, neat and accurate. Per meal price points are very competitive and the food is whole, fresh food (not processed or frozen)! I live in CT but work in NYC so have tried most high end food delivery services in the metro area, Edibolic Kitchen beats them all. Perfect balance of nutritional data to help me with my goals, quality, really good food and reliable, consistent service/performance.

My favorite food prep company EVER.  The food quality and taste is amazing.  I have purchased the meals of the week, custom meals and most recently and been doing the bulk.  It’s very affordable too.  As a IFBB Pro level bodybuilder I have tried many food prep companies across the country and Edibolic is by far the best I’ve ever tried (and NO I am not sponsored or endorsed in anyway for this review).
